means: 宣告…无罪，赦免…的罪行，宽恕…的罪行
不受责难，免除责任 [义务] ,开脱（罪责）

sentence.Network_en: I absolve you, on the ground of invincible ignorance.
sentence.Network_cn: 鉴于你不可救药的无知,我原谅你.

sentence.Network_en: My good cousin, absolve yourself from sorrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的好姐姐, 别自寻烦恼吧.

sentence.Network_en: I shall absolve you and continue along the path of righteousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我就宽恕你们,大家各走各的路.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... absolute ? v. 绝对的，无限制的 absolve ? v. 赦免；使无罪 abstain ? v. 主动戒绝 ，自我抑制.
英语构词法研究之一：A|英语单词构词法 ... absolute 纯粹,完全,绝对的 absolve 免除,赦免,解除 absorb 吸收.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(一)|联想记忆法背单词 ... absolute adj. 绝对的 absolve v. 赦免；解除（责任） absorb v. 吸收，吸引；并吞.
美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... abscond 潜逃,逃跑 absolve 宣告无罪 abstract 摘要.

list.abs: This cannot absolve you from all responsibility ., 这并不能解除你的全部责任.
i absolve you from all your sins ., 我赦免你所有的罪过.
he cannot entirely absolve himself of the charge ., 他不能完全开脱掉这一指责.
"absolve"怎么说合适-翻译"absolve"-可可查词 ... absolve from 解除责任等; 赫免; absolve from responsibility 免除责任.
I absolve you from your vows ., 我解除你的誓约.
mediocrities everywhere , I absolve you .到处都是庸才。我赦免你们的罪。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin absolvere 'set free, acquit', from ab- 'from' + solvere 'loosen'

entry.tran: 免除…的过失;解除…的责任
entry.def: If a report or investigation absolves someone from blame or responsibility, it formally states that he or she is not guilty or is not to blame.

example.ex: A police investigation yesterday absolved the police of all blame in the incident.
example.tran: 警方昨天的调查廓清了其在此事件中的任何责任。
宣告士兵们并无任何过失的调查

means.word_mean: 1. grant remission of a sin to;

sentences.sentence: "The priest absolved him and told him to say ten Hail Mary's"

auth_sentence.content: But there were plenty of voices prepared to absolve Fellaini.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there were plenty of voices prepared to absolve Fellaini.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there were plenty of voices prepared to absolve Fellaini.

auth_sentence.content: But honesty does not absolve the coalition or Whitehall of blame.
auth_sentence.res_content: But honesty does not absolve the coalition or Whitehall of blame.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But honesty does not absolve the coalition or Whitehall of blame.

auth_sentence.content: Second, that psychiatry exists to absolve people from their criminal responsibility.
auth_sentence.res_content: Second, that psychiatry exists to absolve people from their criminal responsibility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Second, that psychiatry exists to absolve people from their criminal responsibility.

stems_affixes.word_buile: solv溶解,解决,松开+able可以……的→adj.可以解的,可以解决的
in无+solvent有偿债能力的→adj.无钱还债的
solv溶解,解决,松开+ent……的→adj.有偿债能力的 n.溶剂
re再+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.决心;[使]分解,溶解;决议 n.解决;决心
solv溶解,解决,松开+ency表名词→n.溶解力,还债能力
solv溶解,解决,松开+ent……的→adj.有偿债能力的 n.溶剂

stems_affixes.value_cn: 免除责任,宣布赦免罪过
stems_affixes.word_buile: ab去掉,免除+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→松开→免罪
dis分开+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→松开分散→没有限制
re再+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.决心;[使]分解,溶解;决议 n.解决;决心
solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.解决,解答

means.word_mean: 宣告…无罪，赦免…的罪行，宽恕…的罪行

sentences.en: The court absolved him of guilt in her death.
sentences.cn: 法庭赦免了他在她的死亡中所犯的罪。

means.word_mean: 不受责难, 免除责任 〔义务〕 , 开脱(罪责)

sentences.en: He absolved me from further obligation.
sentences.cn: 他解除了我更多的责任。

sentences.en: The priest absolved him of his sins.
